cn: 小心！閣樓房間裡有搗蛋鬼出沒，為什麼雲朵裡的水會往上流呢？
悄悄走入神祕的森林小徑，樹的年輪像時鐘轉動，看！動物精靈！
樹會發光，還會說故事呢，有狗狗陪伴的每一天，好幸福、好快樂～
冒險開始、車輪轉動，騎著腳踏車來逛奇幻的動物大街，
一轉眼，來到了一個像海的地方，海洋生物也有夢想嗎？
讓我們陪伴著牠們一起回家⋯⋯
en: Watch out! There is a Ghost in the Attic, why does the water in the clouds flow up?
Sneak into the mysterious forest path, the tree rings turned like a clock. Look! There’s an animal fairy!
The trees will shimmer and even tell stories. Every day with the doggy are so happy and felicity.
Start the adventure, turn the wheels, ride the bike and go through the fantasy animal street.
Suddenly, came to a place like the Sea.
Do sea creatures also have a dream? Let's go home together with them.

books.title: 《閣樓房間裡的搗蛋鬼》
info: 房間裡有搗蛋鬼出沒，為什麼雲朵裡的水會往上流呢？
